title: Sri Lanka Cash Reserve Ratio
description: Sri Lanka Cash Reserve Ratio was at 4 percent on Thursday November 10. Cash Reserve Ratio in Sri Lanka averaged 7.75 percent from 1999 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 11 percent in January of 2000 and a record low of 2 percent in June of 2020. This page provides - Sri Lanka Cash Reserve Ratio- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Central Bank of Sri Lanka
